mapper.sql: FDPROLISTMX_ID, FDPRO_ID, KIN_ID, FDPROLISTMX_NUMBER, FDPROLISTMX_MONEY, FDPROLISTMX_COUNT, FDPROLISTMX_TIME, REMARK
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM erp_prolistmxsmall s ,erp_kinds k WHERE s.KIN_ID = k.KIN_ID AND s.FDPRO_ID = #{fdproId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT * FROM erp_prolistmxsmall mall,erp_fdproform fd,erp_kinds kind WHERE mall.KIN_ID=kind.KIN_ID AND mall.FDPRO_ID=fd.FDPRO_ID AND fd.ISVA='1' AND kind.ISVA='1' AND mall.ISVA='1' AND fd.FDPRO_ID=#{fdproId}
mapper.insert: insert into erp_prolistmxsmall (FDPROLISTMX_ID, FDPRO_ID, KIN_ID, FDPROLISTMX_NUMBER, FDPROLISTMX_MONEY, FDPROLISTMX_COUNT, FDPROLISTMX_TIME, REMARK) values (#{fdprolistmxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdproId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdprolistmxNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdprolistmxMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fdprolistmxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fdprolistmxTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update erp_prolistmxsmall
FDPRO_ID = #{fdproId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KIN_ID = #{kinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDPROLISTMX_NUMBER = #{fdprolistmxNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDPROLISTMX_MONEY = #{fdprolistmxMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FDPROLISTMX_COUNT = #{fdprolistmxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FDPROLISTMX_TIME = #{fdprolistmxTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FDPROLISTMX_ID = #{fdprolistmxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update erp_prolistmxsmall set FDPRO_ID = #{fdproId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KIN_ID = #{kinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDPROLISTMX_NUMBER = #{fdprolistmxNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDPROLISTMX_MONEY = #{fdprolistmxMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDPROLISTMX_COUNT = #{fdprolistmxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FDPROLISTMX_TIME = #{fdprolistmxTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FDPROLISTMX_ID = #{fdprolistmxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE erp_prolistmxsmall SET isva = 0 WHERE FDPROLISTMX_ID = #{fdprolistmxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
